product_name: Sea to Summit Alpha Light Spork and Knife Set
long_description: With the ultralight Sea To Summit Alpha Light spork and knife set, you can carry high-quality utensils without worrying about the weight. Made from aircraft-grade 7075-T6 aluminum alloy that is hard anodized for excellent durability. Spork weighs in at a mere 0.3 oz. and the knife at just 0.2 oz. Includes a small accessory carabiner so you can clip the spork and knife together and attach them to a pack, mug or another utensil. And just a heads up, the packaging is completely recyclable, so don't let us catch you throwing it away!
short_description: With the ultralight Sea To Summit Alpha Light spork and knife set, you can carry high-quality utensils without worrying about the weight.
